title: [综合]NoFall —— 取消掉落伤害[1.7~1.8]
author: 西木凛
txt_content:
本帖最后由 西木凛 于 2015-1-26 17:04 编辑 

+ Description +Players with the "nofall.use" permission will not take fall damage 



+ Commands +
There are no commands for this plugin.  这个插件没有命令

+ Permissions +nofall.use (A player with that permission will not take fall damage) 
拥有该权限的人在Config配置的世界列表中可以有效防止摔伤

+ Configuration +插件有效世界的列表可以往下继续添加,但需要注意世界名大小写
# make sure you use the exact capital letters as spelled in your worlds #
worlds:
  - world
  - world_nether
  - world_the_end  - 注意世界名大小写
